synopsis: Kaoruko Moeta (Pen name: Kaos) is a brand new 4-panel manga artist, trying to get into the business. However, she finds out that her series had gotten the worst survey results. Her editor worries about her wellbeing and suggests that she go live at an all-girls dorm for manga artists.

After Kaos and Koyume start living at the dorm for a while, they all decide to go take a trip into the city together. There, they decide to go to a crepe shop and a huge art store and enjoy their time together.

After her experience at the crepe shop, Kaos creates a new manga storyboard and takes it to Amisawa, but it’s immediately declined because of the shape it’s in. She goes back to the dorm to ask everyone what she did wrong and...

Because of a deadline coming up, Ruki ends up staying up two nights in a row. She ends up going to school in this condition and can’t help but feel sleepy, despite how earnestly she usually tries at school. However, this dazed state she’s in makes her look sexier than usual, causing a stir in class...

Kaos and the other girls end up at the beach, solely because Koyume tells them, “Because it’s summer!” However, Koyume was the only one who brought a swimsuit, because she’s the only one who had the idea of actually having fun at the beach, so she takes them to the rental shop so they can all get swimsuits.

One hot summer night, Kaos spots someone suspicious while she’s in the bath. She looks in that direction again, but no one’s there. Kaos is terrified and heads back to her room with Koyume... But then a mysterious dark shadow chases them from behind!
Koyume lands a serialized series! Kaos is happy for her but is sad that her own skills aren’t improving. She then decides to help Fuura-senpai with her manga and ends up with surprising results.
